item.title: Let HomeAssistant notify you of updates
item.description: HomeAssistant releases new updates very regularly. Each month there is a new release which usually receives several patch releases as well. If you want to keep up with updates or even update automatically, it’s nice to get notified upon the release of an update. Prerequisites HomeAssistant has a built-in updater sensor which automatically checks for the updates and changes state, if it finds one. This can be used as trigger in an automation.
